name: Live and Stay - Ekmanska
description: Located within less than 1 km of Scandinavium and a 13-minute walk of Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre in the centre of Gothenburg, Live and Stay Ekmanska provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. Private parking is available on site. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Ullevi, Gothenburg Central Station and Nordstan Shopping Mall. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 25 km from Live and Stay Ekmanska.

name: Quality Hotel Panorama, Gothenburg
description: This hotel is 7 minutes’ walk from the Swedish Exhibition Centre and Liseberg Amusement Park. The main shopping street, Avenyn is 1 km away. It offers free WiFi and free access to the relax area. All rooms at Comfort Hotel Panorama are decorated in modern Scandinavian style and some have city views. The hotel's Barception sells food & drinks. Comfort Hotel Panorama has a well-equipped gym that is free for hotel guests and open 24 hours a day.

name: Comfort Hotel City
description: Comfort Hotel City is a welcoming urban base camp in the centre of Gothenburg, ideal for a pleasant and central accommodation at a reasonable price. It lies right in the centre of the pulsating restaurant and shopping district, only 3 minutes walk from Central Station. Accommodation suits single, double, twin or four-bedded rooms with effective sound insulation and comfortable beds to ensure a good nights sleep. The Barception with delicafe is open around the clock with local food and drinks, a town guide, a blazing campfire and there is a guest kitchen with laundry facilities.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Göta Avenyn
description: Located next to main pedestrian street Avenyn, the convenient City Hotell Avenyn offers easy access to all of Gothenburg's sights. Stay just a 10 minute walk from the Liseberg Amusement Park and the Svenska Mässan Conference Centre. All of City Hotell Avenyn's comfortable guest rooms have wooden floors, TV, phones and radios. The high room ceilings keep the air fresh. All rooms include 24 hours of free internet access. For relaxing moments after a busy day exploring Gothenburg, there are a variety of restaurants and bars just within 5 minutes' walk.
